articles.title: Huawei outshines Apple with Mate XT, upstaging iPhone 16 launch - TechHQ

articles.content:

articles.title: FDA approves Apple AirPods Pro 2 to be used as hearing aids - CBS News
articles.description: Tech giant's latest AirPods will soon function as hearing aids for people with mild to moderate hearing loss.
articles.content:
Apple AirPods Pro 2 can soon be used as hearing aids, after they received Food and Drug Administration (FDA) clearance, in what experts call a game changer for the hearing aid market.
